text: Life on the Wire is British jazz fusion duo Morrissey–Mullen's fourth album. It was released in 1982, reaching number 47 in the UK Albums Chart. ==Track listing== # "Life on the Wire" # "Takin' Time" # "Face of a Child" # "Come and Get Me" # "Brazil Nut" # "Ships that Pass in the Night" # "Making Waves" # "Running Out of Time" ==Charts== {| class=wikitable ! Chart (1982) ! Peak position |- |} ==Personnel== *Dick Morrissey - saxophones *Jim Mullen - guitar *Claire Hamill - vocals *Carol Kenyon - vocals *Tony Beard - drums *Chris Fletcher - percussion *John McKenzie - bass *John Critchinson - keyboards *Danny Schogger - synthesizer ==References== Category:1982 albums Category:Morrissey–Mullen albums Category:Beggars Banquet Records albums
title: Life on the Wire
